forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
This evening in Downtown San Francisco, the sky stretches clear and open, a rare canvas of deepening twilight that invites exploration. The temperature will dip to a comfortable 53 degrees, creating an atmosphere that is brisk yet invigorating, perfectly suited for an evening stroll. With gusts from the west southwest swirling briskly at 12 to 21 mph, the air carries a refreshing edge, invigorating for those venturing out after sunset.

As dusk settles, a hint of the marine layer may linger near the coast, casting a soft veil over the Golden Gate that dances like whispers across the water. While the fog may be on the periphery, tonight's clarity prevails, showcasing the vibrant city lights against the darkening sky. For those looking to enjoy the evening, a light jacket will provide just the right warmth amid the gentle breezes. Consider visiting a cozy local café or taking a leisurely walk along the waterfront, where the sounds of the city harmonize with the serene waves. Engage in simple pleasures—perhaps a sweet dessert to satisfy your senses under the luminous glow of the streetlights.
